overview: Directed by Edoardo Nervi and Lea & Vera Borniotto, in homage to the iconic director Edward D. Wood Jr. The three directors wanted to make a short film freely inspired by the 1959 film "Plan 9 from Outer Space", setting it in the difficult scenario of the Coronavirus pandemic ongoing.  The genius of the short film lies in having made all the shooting and editing without ever leaving the house, in accordance with the restrictive Dpcm "Stay Home".
title: Covid-19 From Outer Space
